Name: Relation to lowering the speed limit for bicycles with electric assist.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to lowering the speed limit for bicycles with electric assist

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

Summary: This bill would lower the speed limit for e-bikes to 15 miles per hour.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Subchapter 3 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-177.1 to read as follows:
      � 19-177.1 Speed limit for bicycles with electric assist. a. Definitions. For the purposes of this section, the term "bicycle with electric assist" has the same definition as contained in section 102-c of the vehicle and traffic law or successor provision.
      b. No person shall operate a bicycle with electric assist in excess of 15 miles per hour.
      c. Any person who violates subdivision b of this section is liable for a civil penalty not to exceed $50.
      � 2. This local law takes effect 180 days after it becomes law.
LH
LS #18787
06/05/25

      1
      
      
      2
